content:
Grab yourself all 6 of the Buddha's Eyes in Fright Cliff and place them into the odd-looking rock near the Stone Vanguard. The result will be the emergence of Shigandang. 

Shigandang
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Secret Bosses in Chapter 2" and the sub-section "Shigandang". The content is presented below:

Grab yourself all 6 of the Buddha's Eyes in Fright Cliff and place them into the odd-looking rock near the Stone Vanguard. The result will be the emergence of Shigandang. 

Shigandang
